title: 26. Roomie Chat: Neck Lines, Makeup I Love + Makeup Brush Hygiene, MLMs, Tretinoin + Holistic Esthetics!
description:
Hi Roomies, this is a casual, Q+A based episode! I am covering:

- Why I'm anti-MLM

- How to treat neck lines

- Why you should clean your makeup brushes after every use

- Makeup brand favorites

- Chemical Peels

- Tretinon (my personal opinion, not a recommendation!)

- How to start a skincare routine

- Tips for self care

- How to study holistic esthetics

You can shop my Glymed store here

Shop Mega-Purifying Cleanser

Association of Holistic Skincare Practitioners

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa
